headline: St Totteringham’s Day massacre
notes: Arsenal win the title at White Hart Lane.

headline: Five down in 21 minutes – historic humiliation
notes: Fans left the stadium before 30 mins.

headline: Seven past Hugo – at home!
notes: Spurs’ worst European home defeat ever.

headline: From 2–0 up to out – Zagreb jail-breaks Spurs
notes: Manager was in prison earlier that season.

headline: Ten-man Toon destroy Spurs’ top 2 dreams
notes: Arsenal leapfrog them on final day.

headline: Beaten by a bankrupt and relegated Pompey
Booed off the pitch on New Year’s Day
Championship side ends another FA Cup dream
League Two banter exit
notes: No goals. Knocked out on pens.

headline: Adebayor red sparks North London carnage
Robbed by a phantom goal. Still lost.
Lost on pens, played not to win
Slovenian minnows humble Spurs
notes: Lowest-ranked team in the competition defeats Tottenham.

headline: Two-goal lead evaporates in second half
notes: Conceded three after halftime to lose at home.
